1.name: Seal World Line
1.text: <Search> for a card. Do not reveal it, and place it face-down under this card. When this is destroyed, add the saved card to your hand.

2.name: Seal World Line
2.text: <Search> for up to three cards. Do not reveal them, and place them face-down under this card. When this leaves the battlefield, shuffle the saved cards into your deck.
